name: Zipper - WorldWide Connect
tag_list: worldwide-dating, connecting-facebook-users, facebook-online-dating, free-facebook-dating, facebook-dating, facebook-dating-app, free-dating-app, free-facebook-dating-app, facebook-app, free-facebook-app
overview:
Zipper – WorldWide Connect is a Dating/Matchmaking application on Facebook.

Zipper takes all the information you have entered into your Facebook profile and puts it into your Zipper profile (Music, Education, Sports, etc.). Your Zipper profile is then compared to all the other Zipper user’s profiles, and informs you which users you have the most in common with.

Zipper is the ONLY app on Facebook that uses this unique concept to match users together. Since all the information used in comparing users is already on their personal Facebook profiles, the need to fill out surveys has been done away with.
